synopsis.text:
Known for her love of sweets and not much else, Ichigo Amano, a clumsy 14-year-old, finds her life taking a delightful turn when she encounters renowned pâtissier Henri Lucas. Recognizing her remarkable tasting abilities, Henri invites her to join the prestigious St. Marie Academy, a culinary school dedicated to the art of dessert-making.

Despite her lack of experience, Ichigo's infectious enthusiasm and newfound dream of becoming a pâtissière like her beloved grandmother propel her into the elite group of the 'Sweets Princes' – a trio of talented and handsome young chefs known for their magical desserts. Alongside her new friends and the enchanting Sweets Spirits, who partner with aspiring pâtissiers to help them achieve their dreams, Ichigo embarks on a journey filled with challenges, growth, and, of course, delectable treats.

In this competitive world of confectionery, Ichigo and the Sweets Princes strive to perfect their skills and reach the top, all while forming unforgettable bonds and discovering the true ingredients of success. Will Ichigo's passion for sweets and her unwavering determination be enough to transform her from a dessert-loving amateur to a celebrated pâtissière? Join Ichigo and her friends as they bake, learn, and laugh their way through the enchanting world of St. Marie Academy.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
